_description: Do not wait until you are old before you marry a rich wife — five quatrains

BLHar2252.First Lines: Som do entendeThere yowthe for to spende…
BLHar2252.Last Lines:
…Gentylly to haue dalyanceWhylys your yowthe deþe
                    tary
